item.title: Version 1.0.0
item.description:
Initial Release

  • Bidirectional document cloaking and uncloaking
  • 8 entity types auto-detected (email, phone, SSN, EIN, amounts, addresses, URLs, person names)
  • Party alias support for parenthetical defined terms
  • Format-preserving replacement with case transfer
  • Tracked changes, comments, and metadata handling
  • Native macOS app with EULA, Help menu, and user guide
